app.name: Comment Enforcement
app.short_description: Require comments and enforce public/private on non-Solved tickets.
app.long_description: Comment Enforcement prevents silent updates and enforces the correct comment type on non-Solved tickets. Default mode is Force Public.
app.installation_instructions: Upload this app ZIP and install. Mode defaults to force_public; you can change it to require_any or force_private.

mode.label: Enforcement mode
mode.helpText: Enter one of: require_any, force_public, or force_private. Default is force_public.

autofixType.label: Auto-switch wrong comment type when possible
autofixType.helpText: If enabled, the app attempts to set the composer to the required type before blocking.

minLength.label: Minimum required characters
minLength.helpText: Set a minimum comment length. 0 disables.
